sentences.sentence: You are fountain of the metempsychosis on the golden string.
sentences.translation: 你是轮回的清泉，在金色的玄线上。

sentences.sentence: The life is samara, the soul meet metempsychosis, samara rebirth. Good is rewarded with good evil will be requited with evil.
sentences.translation: 佛教理念：人有前生来世，人死后灵魂会投胎，轮回重生。善有善报，恶有恶报。此生所造业，下一生受报。
